[![](APHLID.logo.png){fig-alt="APHLID logo"}](https://westernsydney.edu.au/domtru/projects/trials/aphlid)

We will be analysing clinical trial data for the APHLID project, to evaluate a technology-enabled model of care for the support young people with diabetes. Intention-to-treat analyses will be conducted using multiple imputation, to account for missing data.

More information can be found \[here\](<https://westernsydney.edu.au/domtru/projects/trials/aphlid>).
